tome.name: Tome of Thousand Truths
tome.ingredients:
Metal: Gold Raised Metal
Black enamel: Wisdom +1
Red enamel: Strength +1
Ivory enamel: Charisma +1
tome.buffs: Rhyming Charisma: Whenever you use the Tome, gain the ability to speak in rhyme for the hour
tome.debuffs: Ancient Babble: Each time you use the Tome, roll a d20; on a roll of 1, uncontrollably start speaking in an ancient, incomprehensible language

yellowPotion.name: Yellow Potion
yellowPotion.buffs: Solar Boost: Gain temporary immunity to cold-based attacks
yellowPotion.debuffs: Light Sensitivity: Eyes become extra sensitive to bright light for 1 hour after use

redPotion.name: Red Potion
redPotion.buffs: Fireproof: Gain resistance to fire damage for 1 hour
redPotion.debuffs: Hotheaded: Become easily angered and impulsive for 30 minutes after consumption

bluePotion.name: Blue Potion
bluePotion.buffs: Aqua Lungs: Gain the ability to breathe underwater for 2 hours
bluePotion.debuffs: Dehydration: Feel extremely thirsty for 1 hour after the effect wears off

potionSet.name: Potion Set
potionSet.ingredients: Combination of all individual potion ingredients
potionSet.characteristics:
3 vials, 30ml each
Colors: Yellow, Red, Blue
Ornate wooden box included
potionSet.buffs: Alchemist's Fortune: 10% chance to create a random beneficial effect when mixing potions
potionSet.debuffs: Sensory Overload: 5% chance of temporary sensory enhancement, potentially overwhelming

toteBag1.name: Mystical Tote Bag
toteBag1.buffs: Feather-light: The bag and its contents weigh next to nothing
toteBag1.debuffs: Mischievous Pocket: 5% chance of small items playfully 'hiding' in the bag

dagger.name: Shadowstrike Dagger
dagger.buffs: Silent Strike: Grants a +2 bonus to stealth checks when equipped
dagger.debuffs: Shadow Whisper: 10% chance of hearing eerie whispers when in dark areas

sword.name: Stormbreaker Sword
sword.ingredients:
Thunderbolt-forged steel
Storm giant's tear gem
Lightning-imbued runes
sword.buffs: Thunder Charge: Once per day, call down a bolt of lightning for dramatic effect
sword.debuffs: Static Buildup: Hair stands on end for 1 hour after using Thunder Charge

guitar.name: Bardic Inspiration Guitar
guitar.ingredients:
Elvish heartwood
Siren hair strings
Pixie dust frets
guitar.buffs: Melodic Motivation: +1 to all ally skill checks when you play a tune
guitar.debuffs: Earworm Effect: 25% chance listeners can't get your last song out of their head for a day
